projects.title: Agro-ML
projects.description: Agriculture in resource-constrained regions faces significant challenges due to the lack of affordable and accessible diagnostic tools. The project, Agro-ML, aims to address these issues by providing Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) services tailored for small-scale farmers in impoverished areas.

projects.title: Food Buddy
projects.description: It is difficult to maintain a balanced diet. So, in order to battle against nutritional deficiency diseases, we have created a web app. What it does is, it generates personalised diet taking into account what the user has in their pantry and the user's personal conditions and characteristics.
